motd_list.title: Intoxicated Driver turns 2 years old!!!
motd_list.description: The Birthday event is now live! Earn Double XP, enjoy all maps being overhauled and unlock a free limited time cosmetic by completing a challenge!

motd_list.title: Double XP!
motd_list.description: The Birthday event is now live! Now for all events there is double XP untill the event ends! Enjoy leveling up and earning those level rewards!
